title: Fairlight and Bentley CNC Dynamo Rear Light Bracket
content:
Fairlight Cycles and Bentley Components teamed up on a CNC SON rear light bracket, designed to be lightweight, robust, and specifically match the Chris King 3D Violet color…

The price is £35 (or £29.17 exc. VAT for EU and International customers).

Supplied with all the bolts, washers and clips that you need to install the mount to your frame.

Specs:

  • A CNC machined dynamo light bracket for SON rear lights.
  • Manufactured in the UK by Bentley Components. Bentley ‘makers mark’ on inside face of part; it will be hidden by the SON light, but you’ll know it’s there.
  • Beautiful machining details and cutting paths. Heavily relieved sections for an extremely low weight.
  • Suitable for any frame with a spare threaded eyelet or boss.
  • If you have an existing dynamo set-up from us [with a 3D printed plastic mount] then this part can be easily retro-fitted in just a few minutes.
  • A universal part, designed to be used on both the drive side and disc side of the frame.
  • Available in black, silver and purple.
  • Weight – 13g (excluding bolts etc)

 

See more at Fairlight.
